Package hecc_up

Class HeccUpGUI

java.lang.Object
hecc_up.HeccUpGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoggerInterface
public class HeccUpGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements LoggerInterface
This class is basically a GUI for the HECC-UP stuff so a user can actually, y'know, hecc up their stuff.

    • setupTheFileChoosers

      private javax.swing.JFileChooser setupTheFileChoosers​(boolean isHeccFileChooser)
      This method sets up both of the JFileChoosers the GUI uses
      Parameters:
      isHeccFileChooser - if true, sets up the hecc file chooser. if false, sets up the output folder chooser
      Returns:
      A JFileChooser, which has been set up with the appropriate configuration

    • selectHeccFileHandler

      private void selectHeccFileHandler()
      This method is called when someone attempts to select an input hecc file. It handles the process of choosing the hecc file.

    • selectOutputFileHandler

      private void selectOutputFileHandler()
      This method is used when the button to select an output folder is pressed It handles the process of choosing an output folder

    • revalidate

      private void revalidate()
      Revalidates and re-packs the guiFrame bottom text

    • heccUpTheGame

      private void heccUpTheGame()
      Attempts to call the attemptToHeccUpTheGame method of the heccUpHandler object.

      Complains via JOptionPane if user hasn't defined a hecc file and an output folder, or if the .hecc file couldn't be hecced up successfully.

      If it was successful, it gives the user the option of opening it directly in their web browser (and will complain if it was unsuccessful)

    • logInfo

      public void logInfo​(java.lang.String infoToLog)

      Parameters:
